title: Itlachiayaque (xNetHack)
data:
| \[   Itlachiayaque   *(No tile)* |                                                                                                                                                                               |
| -------------------------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| Base item                        | [shield of reflection](/wiki/Shield_of_reflection "Shield of reflection")                                                                                                     |
|                                  |                                                                                                                                                                               |
| Affiliation                      | - [lawful](/wiki/Lawful "Lawful")
- [Archeologist](/wiki/Archeologist "Archeologist")
- [intelligent](/wiki/Intelligent_artifacts "Intelligent artifacts")                    |
|                                  |                                                                                                                                                                               |
| When carried                     | * [warning](/wiki/Warning "Warning")
* [fire resistance](/wiki/Fire_resistance "Fire resistance")                                                                             |
| When worn                        | - [reflection](/wiki/Reflection "Reflection")
- no [spellcasting](/wiki/Spellcasting "Spellcasting") penalty as Archeologist                                                  |
| When invoked                     | * [stinking cloud](/wiki/Scroll_of_stinking_cloud "Scroll of stinking cloud") (only controllable as Archeologist)
* scry as [crystal ball](/wiki/Crystal_ball "Crystal ball") |
|                                  |                                                                                                                                                                               |
| Base price                       | 3500 [zm](/wiki/Zorkmid "Zorkmid")                                                                                                                                            |
| Weight                           | [66](/wiki/Weight "Weight")                                                                                                                                                   |

**Itlachiayaque** is the [Archeologist](/wiki/Archeologist "Archeologist") [quest artifact](/wiki/Quest_artifact "Quest artifact") in [xNetHack](/wiki/XNetHack "XNetHack"), which adapts the artifact from [L's](/wiki/L_\(person\) "L (person)") [Itlachiayaque](/wiki/Itlachiayaque "Itlachiayaque") Patch against [NetHack 3.4.3](/wiki/NetHack_3.4.3 "NetHack 3.4.3"). It is the prize for completing the [Archeologist quest](/wiki/Archeologist_quest "Archeologist quest"), and is [lawful](/wiki/Lawful "Lawful") for generation purposes. Its [base item](/wiki/Base_item "Base item") type is a [shield of reflection](/wiki/Shield_of_reflection "Shield of reflection") made of [gold](/wiki/Gold_\(material\) "Gold (material)").

[ ]

## Contents

- [1 Generation](#Generation)
- [2 Description](#Description)
- [3 Origin](#Origin)
- [4 Encyclopedia entry](#Encyclopedia_entry)

## Generation

For Archeologists, [Schliemann](/index.php?title=Schliemann\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Schliemann (page does not exist)") is [always generated with](/wiki/Monster_starting_inventory "Monster starting inventory") the blessed +1 Itlachiayaque.

## Description

Itlachiayaque confers [warning](/wiki/Warning "Warning") and [fire resistance](/wiki/Fire_resistance "Fire resistance") while carried, and confers [reflection](/wiki/Reflection "Reflection") while worn as normal - an Archeologist wearing Itlachiayaque does not sustain any [spellcasting](/wiki/Spellcasting "Spellcasting") penalty from the shield. [Invoking](/wiki/Invoking "Invoking") Itlachiayaque prompts the [hero](/wiki/Hero "Hero") to choose from two different effects:

- A mass of [poison clouds](/wiki/Poison_cloud "Poison cloud") is generated, with the cloud centered on a non-Archeologist character, while an Archeologist can select the square to center the cloud on as with a [scroll of stinking cloud](/wiki/Scroll_of_stinking_cloud "Scroll of stinking cloud") - Schliemann is capable of applying this ability against the hero if he possesses Itlachiayaque.
- You can gaze into the surface to look for an object, monster, or furniture symbol as with a [crystal ball](/wiki/Crystal_ball "Crystal ball"), using a similar roll versus [intelligence](/wiki/Intelligence "Intelligence"): d8 if you are an Archeologist and d16 for any other role.

## Origin

Itlachiayaque is the name of an object, either a mirror or a shield, carried by the Aztec god Tezcatlipoca (whose name literally translates to "fiery mirror").

## Encyclopedia entry

Tezcatlipoca (Fiery Mirror) was undoubtedly the Jupiter of the  
Nahua pantheon. He carried a mirror or shield \[ Itlachiayaque ],  
from which he took his name, and in which he was supposed to see  
reflected the actions and deeds of mankind. The evolution of this  
god from the status of a spirit of wind or air to that of the  
supreme deity of the Aztec people presents many points of deep  
interest to students of mythology.

\[ The Myths of Mexico and Peru, by Lewis Spence ]

- *This page is a **[stub](/wiki/Category:Stubs "Category:Stubs")**. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by [**expanding this page**.](https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Itlachiayaque_\(xNetHack\)\&action=edit)*
html:
Itlachiayaque (xNetHack)

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
[   Itlachiayaque   (No tile)
Base item shield of reflection
Affiliation
  • lawful
  • Archeologist
  • intelligent
When carried
  • warning
  • fire resistance
When worn
  • reflection
  • no spellcasting penalty as Archeologist
When invoked
  • stinking cloud
    (only controllable as Archeologist)
  • scry as crystal ball
Base price 3500 zm
Weight 66

Itlachiayaque is the Archeologist quest artifact in xNetHack, which adapts the artifact from L's Itlachiayaque Patch against NetHack 3.4.3. It is the prize for completing the Archeologist quest, and is lawful for generation purposes. Its base item type is a shield of reflection made of gold.

Contents

  • 1 Generation
  • 2 Description
  • 3 Origin
  • 4 Encyclopedia entry

Generation

For Archeologists, Schliemann is always generated with the blessed +1 Itlachiayaque.

Description

Itlachiayaque confers warning and fire resistance while carried, and confers reflection while worn as normal - an Archeologist wearing Itlachiayaque does not sustain any spellcasting penalty from the shield. Invoking Itlachiayaque prompts the hero to choose from two different effects:

  • A mass of poison clouds is generated, with the cloud centered on a non-Archeologist character, while an Archeologist can select the square to center the cloud on as with a scroll of stinking cloud - Schliemann is capable of applying this ability against the hero if he possesses Itlachiayaque.
  • You can gaze into the surface to look for an object, monster, or furniture symbol as with a crystal ball, using a similar roll versus intelligence: d8 if you are an Archeologist and d16 for any other role.

Origin

Itlachiayaque is the name of an object, either a mirror or a shield, carried by the Aztec god Tezcatlipoca (whose name literally translates to "fiery mirror").

Encyclopedia entry

Tezcatlipoca (Fiery Mirror) was undoubtedly the Jupiter of the
Nahua pantheon. He carried a mirror or shield [ Itlachiayaque ],
from which he took his name, and in which he was supposed to see
reflected the actions and deeds of mankind. The evolution of this
god from the status of a spirit of wind or air to that of the
supreme deity of the Aztec people presents many points of deep
interest to students of mythology.

[ The Myths of Mexico and Peru, by Lewis Spence ]
